articles.author: Chris Estrada
articles.title: Road America Cup starting lineup: William Byron wins pole - NASCAR on NBC Sports
articles.description: William Byron has not fared well on road courses this season, but he will start Sunday's Cup race at Road America from pole position.
articles.content:
William Byron has won the pole position for Sunday’s NASCAR Cup Series race at Road America.
Pre-race coverage begins Sunday at 2 p.m. ET on NBC with Countdown toGreen. The race is scheduled to take… [+2359 chars]

articles.author: Shannon Pettypiece, Heidi Przybyla
articles.title: White House looking to next pandemic challenge as July 4th signals a reopened nation - NBC News
articles.description: President Joe Biden will use the July 4th weekend to tout what the White House is calling America’s “independence from Covid-19” even as he falls short of his vaccination goal and the country sees the rise in a new dangerous variant.
articles.content: WASHINGTON President Joe Biden will use the July 4th weekend to tout Americas independence from Covid-19 even as he falls short of his vaccination goal with pockets of the country still largely unvac… [+6173 chars]

articles.author: Cameron Cawthorne
articles.title: Fauci says vaccinated people should 'go the extra mile' and wear masks in areas with low vaccination rate - Fox News
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci on Sunday said that Americans traveling to places with a low COVID-19 vaccination rate should "go the extra mile" and wear a mask even if they are fully vaccinated.
articles.content:

articles.author: Amara Walker and Maria Cartaya, CNN
articles.title: Vaccine hesitancy continues for some younger Americans. Here's one reason why - CNN
articles.description: Destiny Britt has given the Covid-19 vaccine a lot of thought and has no plans to get vaccinated anytime soon.
